data.name: AMGA
data.description: [Central service] gLite metadata catalogue. This service only needs to be installed on the request of a VO.

data.name: APEL
data.description: [Site service] This is a "dummy" Service Type to enable the monitoring tests for APEL accounting. All EGEE sites must have one instance of this Service Type, associated with a CE.

data.name: ARC-CE
data.description: [Site service] The Compute Element within the ARC middleware stack.

data.name: CE
data.description: [Site service] The LCG Compute Element. Currently the standard CE within the gLite middleware stack. Soon to be replaced by the CREAM CE.

data.name: CREAM-CE
data.description: [Site service] The CREAM Compute Element is the new CE within the gLite middleware stack.

data.name: CUSTOM.ch.cern.frontier.FroNTier
data.description: FroNTier N-Tier data distribution system. http://frontier.cern.ch/

data.name: CUSTOM.pl.plgrid.BAT.agent
data.description: Service for collecting accounting data from NGI_PL grid

data.name: CUSTOM.pl.plgrid.BazaarSAT
data.description: Bazaar Site Admin Toolkit from NGI_PL grid

data.name: Service.Type.Three
data.description: Service type created from POEM earlier without tag
